google.description: Restricts the search to results from a specific website or domain.
Searches for a specific word or phrase in the title of web pages.
Looks for pages where a particular word or phrase is part of the URL.
Searches for keywords or phrases within the body text of a webpage.
Excludes a specific site or domain from the search results.
Excludes pages with specific words in their title.
Excludes results with certain keywords in the URL.
Excludes pages that contain certain text within their body.

bing.description: Searches for pages that contain specific file types or formats.
Restricts the search to specific file types.
Searches for web pages with specific words or phrases in anchor text (hyperlink text).
Searches for specific terms or phrases within the main body of the web page.
Searches for specific keywords within the title of the web pages.
Searches for websites hosted on a specific IP address.
Prioritizes or prefers results with a specific keyword or attribute.
Limits the search results to a specific website or domain.
Searches for web pages containing a specific word or phrase within the URL.
